TopicTitle: Unjust Flame (Low altitude, easy fly, easy land)

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, and this is the Unjust Flame! It is an easy to fly, land, and customize in-atmosphere plane! It can fly up to 200 m/s at around 1000 meters up, and can go pretty far away and return. It is easy to launch and take off, included with a capsule for one Kerbal, landing lights, landing wheels, and a nice looking air collector. Have fun flying it, and I will see you when I see you!

Download link:

http://www./view/layk7ad08wt8818/Unjust_Flame.craft

But... There's no rudder...

Might want to add that ;P
Nice, but as stated there is no vertical stabilizer so it isn't as easy as you think, trust me it will fly a little better with one.

Nice, but as stated there is no vertical stabilizer so it isn't as easy as you think, trust me it will fly a little better with one.

The thing is I realy can't find an asthetically pleasing way of involving a rudder and, overall, it doesn't really need it. It flies nicely and is an easy beginner's plane. Also, I described it as easily customizable, so feel free to edit it as much as you want

try using the smal rudder on the side's of youre engine.

it does not change the line's of you plane and it may even look cool
